title: Did a study show that Hillary Clinton received over 800,000 votes from non-citizens in the 2016 election?
subtitle: Tramp's supporters claim an academic study showing evidence of hundreds of thousands of illegal votes by Hillary Clinton in the 2016 election.
author: David Emery
vclaim: An academic study cited by the provincial news organizations and the Trump Administration showed that Hillary Clinton received more than 800,000 votes for non-citizens in the 2016 presidential election.
